byline.contributor: Trip Gabriel contributed reporting from Rome, N.Y.
byline.original: By JEREMY W. PETERS and JONATHAN MARTIN

abstract: Donald J Trump is engaged in effort to portray Republican presidential nominating system as rigged and corrupt to compensate for campaign failures and save his chances of securing nomination; Trump has denounced both Republican party and his foes within it in order to both divert attention from delegate losses to Sen Ted Cruz and to play to anti-Washington sentiment among his supporters.

headline.print_headline: Losing Steam,  Trump Blames  G.O.P. System
headline.main: Donald Trump, Losing Ground, Tries to Blame the System

snippet: Mr. Trump and his allies are trying to compensate for organizational deficiencies by framing the Republican primary process as rigged and corrupt.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Trump and his allies are trying to compensate for organizational deficiencies by framing the Republican primary process as rigged and corrupt.
